text: {| class="wikitable floatright" style="font-size: 0.9em; width: 270px;" |+ Minor planets discovered: 32 |- | see |} is a Japanese farmer and amateur astronomer. He is a prolific discoverer of minor planets, credited by the Minor Planet Center with the discovery and co-discovery of 32 numbered minor planets between 1986 and 1996. He also co-discovered 112P/Urata-Niijima, a periodic comet of the Jupiter family in 1986. The main-belt asteroid 5507 Niijima, discovered by Takeshi Urata and Kenzo Suzuki, was named in his honor. Naming citation was published on 1 September 1993 (). == List of discovered minor planets == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 89%; float: left; width: 24em; margin-right: 1em; line-height: 1.65em !important; height: 324px; |- | 3565 Ojima || 22 December 1986|| |- | 3585 Goshirakawa || 28 January 1987|| |- | 3686 Antoku || 3 March 1987|| |- | 4375 Kiyomori || 28 February 1987|| |- | 4376 Shigemori || 20 March 1987|| |- | 4377 Koremori || 4 April 1987|| |- | 4402 Tsunemori || 25 February 1987|| |- | 4574 Yoshinaka || 20 December 1986|| |- | 4767 Sutoku || 4 April 1987|| |- | 4896 Tomoegozen || 20 December 1986|| |- | 5578 Takakura || 28 January 1987|| |- | 5830 Simohiro || 9 March 1991|| |} {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 89%; float: left; width: 24em; margin-right: 1em; line-height: 1.65em !important; height: 324px; |- | 5912 Oyatoshiyuki || 20 December 1989|| |- | 6158 Shosanbetsu || 12 November 1991|| |- | 7139 Tsubokawa || 14 February 1994|| |- | 7202 Kigoshi || 19 February 1995|| |- | || 12 October 1987|| |- | 7752 Otauchunokai || 31 October 1988|| |- | 8344 Babette || 25 January 1987|| |- | || 24 November 1995|| |- | 10162 Issunboushi || 2 January 1995|| |- | 10727 Akitsushima || 25 February 1987|| |- | || 1 March 1995|| |- | || 25 February 1987|| |} {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 89%; float: left; width: 24em; margin-right: 1em; line-height: 1.65em !important; height: 324px; |- | 17472 Dinah || 17 March 1991|| |- | || 28 January 1987|| |- | || 15 November 1990|| |- | 26168 Kanaikiyotaka || 24 November 1995|| |- | 26170 Kazuhiko || 24 January 1996|| |- | || 1 March 1995|| |- | || 20 November 1995|| |- | || 29 November 1986|| |- ! colspan=3 style="font-weight: normal; text-align: left; padding: 4px 12px 40px 12px;" |Co-discovery made with: T. title: Tsuneo Niijima
